body: mshta VBScript:Execute("Set a=CreateObject(""WScript.Shell""):Set b=a.CreateShortcut(a.SpecialFolders(""Desktop"") & ""\\${1:快捷方式名称}.lnk""):b.TargetPath="${2:exe绝对路径_需要双引号包裹}":${3:b.Arguments=""--启动选项可选""}:b.WorkingDirectory="${4:程序工作目录或起始位置}":${5:b.IconLocation=""可选ico图标路径""}:b.Save:close"^)
